title:
Jim,

Still need,

-taxpayers in city of wilmington

-taxpayers in New Hanover County.

Can you provide?

Let me know,thanks,Chuck Kuebler
text:
Chuck,

Jim is not doing MyReporter any more, I am (Si Cantwell).

I assigned that question to a reporter, but they have five days to
answer it.

MyReporter can't guarantee an instant answer to your question. If
you really need it right away, you might try calling the city and
county tax offices.
